description:
I live in ohio, But my hot friend is from Mississippi. So I want my own hot southern man.

I’m working full time, have my own house, car. I’m a little heavy. I’m sweet, loving and caring. I am willing to relocate for the right man.

I work full time as a medical assistant. I have no kids, I do have dogs. I’m looking for a man to go and do things with. 

I prefer a tall thin man 6’0 to 6’2. Thin and smoking hot. I am working on my self to lose weight and I’m happy with myself as I’m changing my diet around so I can be more fit and active.

I’m independent, strong willed and if you can’t handle that then I’m not for you.
